meanings.meaning_en_US: A long, narrow mark or band.

examples.sentence: Draw a [line] from here to there.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 從這裡到那裡畫一條線。

examples.sentence: There was a long [line] at the ticket booth.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 票販子那裡排了長長的一條隊伍。

examples.sentence: He wrote his name on the [line].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在那條線上寫下了自己的名字。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The state or process of taking pleasure in something.

examples.sentence: The [enjoyment] of music is universal.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 音樂的享受是普遍的。

examples.sentence: He took great [enjoyment] in reading.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他非常享受閱讀。

examples.sentence: Her [enjoyment] of the film was evident.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對這部電影的享受顯而易見。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The limb of the human body that extends from the hip to the ankle.

examples.sentence: He injured his [leg] while playing soccer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在踢足球時受傷了他的腿。

examples.sentence: She has long [legs] that help her run fast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有修長的腿，使她能快速奔跑。

examples.sentence: Sit with your [legs] crossed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 坐著時雙腿交叉。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To go up or ascend, especially by using the hands and feet.

examples.sentence: She decided to [climb] the mountain.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定爬山。

examples.sentence: He wants to [climb] the tree to get the fruit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想爬樹去摘水果。

examples.sentence: The children love to [climb] on the playground equipment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們喜歡在遊樂設施上爬來爬去。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A solid piece of hard material, typically with flat surfaces.

examples.sentence: He built the wall with a large [block].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用一個大方塊建造牆壁。

examples.sentence: Make sure the [blocks] fit together tightly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保這些方塊緊密結合。

examples.sentence: The city was divided into several [blocks].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個城市被劃分為幾個區域。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To obstruct or prevent movement or progress.

examples.sentence: They tried to [block] the view with a curtain.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們試圖用窗簾阻擋視線。

examples.sentence: The traffic was [blocked] due to the accident.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 因事故導致交通被堵。

examples.sentence: You need to [block] unwanted calls.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要阻止不必要的來電。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A small disc or knob sewn onto a garment, used for fastening.

examples.sentence: He lost a [button] from his shirt.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的襯衫掉了一個扣子。

examples.sentence: Please press the [button] to start the machine.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請按下按鈕啟動機器。

examples.sentence: She sewed a new [button] onto her coat.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在外套上縫了一個新扣子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who performs in plays, movies, or television.

examples.sentence: The [actor] received an award for his performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位演員因其表現獲得了獎項

examples.sentence: She wants to become a famous [actor].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想成為一位著名的演員

examples.sentence: The [actor] portrayed the character beautifully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位演員完美地詮釋了這個角色

meanings.meaning_en_US: A written or printed message addressed to a person.

examples.sentence: I received a [letter] from my friend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我收到了一封來自朋友的信。

examples.sentence: Please write a [letter] to your teacher.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請寫一封信給你的老師。

examples.sentence: The [letter] contained important information.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這封信包含了重要信息。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To perform an action or activity.

examples.sentence: I need to [do] my homework.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要做我的作業。

examples.sentence: What should I [do] next?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我接下來應該做什麼？

examples.sentence: They will [do] their best.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們會竭盡所能。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To take part in commercial trading of a particular commodity.

examples.sentence: She plans to [deal] with several suppliers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她計劃與幾家供應商交易。

examples.sentence: They will [deal] in antiques this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們今年將專門做古董的交易。

examples.sentence: It's important to [deal] fairly with customers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公平地對待顧客是很重要的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ninth month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [September].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在[九月]。

examples.sentence: The season begins in early [September].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 季節在[九月]初開始。

examples.sentence: School starts in [September] every year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每年[九月]開學。

meanings.meaning_en_US: On or towards the side of the body that is opposite the right.

examples.sentence: Turn [left] at the traffic light.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在紅綠燈那裡向左轉。

examples.sentence: She is left-handed and writes with her [left] hand.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是左撇子，用她的左手寫字。

examples.sentence: The book is on the [left] side of the shelf.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書在書架的左邊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To talk or articulate sounds verbally.

examples.sentence: I can [speak] three languages.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會說三種語言。

examples.sentence: Please [speak] clearly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請說清楚。

examples.sentence: He won't [speak] until he is ready.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不會說話，直到他準備好了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flat, typically round container used for holding food.

examples.sentence: She placed the fruit in a large [dish].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把水果放在一個大盤子裡

examples.sentence: The chef prepared a special [dish] for the guests.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 廚師為客人準備了一道特別的菜

examples.sentence: He washed the [dish] after dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在晚餐後清洗了盤子

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of furniture for sleep or rest.

examples.sentence: He sleeps in his [bed] every night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他每晚都在床上睡覺。

examples.sentence: I made the [bed] this morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今天早上我整理了床。

examples.sentence: The [bed] is comfortable and cozy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這張床舒適而溫馨。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A male monarch who rules a kingdom.

examples.sentence: The [king] held a grand feast in the castle.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 國王在城堡中舉行了一場豪華的盛宴。

examples.sentence: Every citizen respected the [king] for his wisdom.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位市民都因王的智慧而尊敬他。

examples.sentence: The [king] announced a new law today.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 國王今天宣佈了一項新法律。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Every person; all people.

examples.sentence: [Everyone] is invited to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: [每個人]都被邀請參加派對。

examples.sentence: I think [everyone] should have a say.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我認為[每個人]都應該有發言權。

examples.sentence: In the end, [everyone] agreed on the decision.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 最後，[每個人]都同意了這個決定。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Constituting number six in a sequence.

examples.sentence: She was the [sixth] runner to finish the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是第六個完成比賽的跑者。

examples.sentence: This is my [sixth] attempt to solve the puzzle.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是我第六次嘗試解決這個謎題。

examples.sentence: On the [sixth] day, we finally rested.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在第六天，我們終於休息了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Exactly or only.

examples.sentence: I [just] finished my homework.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我剛完成我的作業。

examples.sentence: He is [just] a friend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他只是一個朋友。

examples.sentence: We arrived [just] in time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們正好按時到達。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 80 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The celebration marked her [eightieth] birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次慶祝活動標誌著她的第八十個生日

examples.sentence: He finished in [eightieth] place in the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在比賽中獲得第八十名

examples.sentence: Her [eightieth] anniversary at work is next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在工作中的第八十個周年下個月就到了
